itemDescription: DJ Mog – DJ & producer from Belfast, Northern Ireland

wikipedia_page.main: DJ Mog is a Northern Irish house DJ and producer whose single "Somewhere" (featuring the singer Sarah Lynn) reached #1 on Billboard's Hot Dance Airplay Chart in America.

link_mentions.page: List of artists who reached number one on the U.S. dance airplay chart
List of number-one dance airplay hits of 2010 (U.S.)

response: The song "Somewhere" was released in 2010 by Northern Irish electronic music artist DJ Mog. Singer-songwriter Sarah Lynn provided vocals on the track as well as co-wrote it. The pair have performed the song live in support of other acts such as Fatboy Slim, during the artist's visits to Belfast.
